mapper.select: SELECT m.manager_brandname AS manager_brandname, sum((i.item_price * s.sell_amount)) AS brandtotal FROM manager m LEFT JOIN item i ON m.manager_idx = i.re_manager_idx LEFT JOIN sell_detail s ON i.item_idx = s.rf_item_idx WHERE m.manager_adminauth='Y' AND m.manager_del_yn ='N' GROUP BY i.re_manager_idx

WITH TMP AS ( SELECT m.manager_brandname AS manager_brandname , DATE_FORMAT(s.sell_pay_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS days , sum((i.item_price * sd.sell_amount)) AS dayTotal , DATE_FORMAT(sell_date, '%Y%m%d') AS sell_date FROM manager m LEFT JOIN item i ON m.manager_idx = i.re_manager_idx LEFT JOIN sell_detail sd ON i.item_idx = sd.rf_item_idx LEFT JOIN sell s ON s.sell_idx = sd.RF_SELL_IDX WHERE m.manager_id= #{manager_id} GROUP BY s.sell_pay_date )
SELECT IFNULL(max(days), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-6 DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')) AS days , IFNULL(max(dayTotal), 0) AS dayTotal FROM TMP WHERE sell_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-6 DAY), '%Y%m%d') UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(max(days), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-5 DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')), IFNULL(max(dayTotal), 0) FROM TMP WHERE sell_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-5 DAY), '%Y%m%d') UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(max(days), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-4 DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')), IFNULL(max(dayTotal), 0) FROM TMP WHERE sell_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-4 DAY), '%Y%m%d') UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(max(days), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-3 DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')), IFNULL(max(dayTotal), 0) FROM TMP WHERE sell_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-3 DAY), '%Y%m%d') UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(max(days), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-2 DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')), IFNULL(max(dayTotal), 0) FROM TMP WHERE sell_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-2 DAY), '%Y%m%d') UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(max(days), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-1 DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')), IFNULL(max(dayTotal), 0) FROM TMP WHERE sell_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(max(days), DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-0 DAY), '%Y.%m.%d')), IFNULL(max(dayTotal), 0) FROM TMP WHERE sell_date = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL-0 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
